title.narrative: Extraordinary contribution to ICRC's support to Syrian refugees and exposed groups in Iraq, 2013

description.narrative: The grant supported the ICRC appeal for Iraq 2013, focusing on Syrian refugees and other vulnerable groups in Iraq. Thousands of people fleeing the conflict in Syria have taken refuge over the border in Kurdistan and other parts of Iraq. ICRC in Iraq aimed at supporting IDPs and residents restore their livelihood in remote and/or neglected areas prone to violence, assisting primarily households headed by women, supporting physical rehabilitation and primary health care centres and repairing and upgrading water, health and detention infrastructure. When needed, the ICRC distributed food and household items to help vulnerable people, including IDPs and Syrian refugees, cope with difficult circumstances.
